actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase from $3,000 to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings which is permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deductions from benefits thereunder.
